channel.title: Mediagazer
channel.description: Top news and commentary for media professionals from all around the web

item.title: 家宅捜索の前にマリオン市警本部長を調査していたというマリオン郡記録紙オーナー、エリック・マイヤー氏へのインタビュー（Marisa Kabas/The Handbasket）
item.description:
Marisa Kabas / The Handbasket:
An interview with the Marion County Record owner Eric Meyer, who says his newspaper had been investigating the City of Marion Police Chief prior to the raids  —  Eric Meyer says his paper had been investigating the police chief prior to the raids on his office and home.

item.title: カンザス州のマリオン郡記録への家宅捜索について、警察はジャーナリストが犯罪行為の容疑者である場合にはプライバシー保護法は適用されないと弁明している（Sherman Smith/Kansas Reflector）。
item.description:
Sherman Smith / Kansas Reflector:
Police defend their raid on Kansas' Marion County Record, saying the Privacy Protection Act doesn't apply when journalists are suspected of criminal activity  —  Police raided the Marion County Record office Aug. 11, 2023, with a search warrant that free press attorneys and advocates say violated federal law.

item.title: 分析：米国のトップ・ストリーミング・サービスのバスケットは、今秋には月額87ドルになる（1年前は73ドル）。
item.description:
Financial Times:
Analysis: a basket of the top US streaming services will cost $87 per month this fall, vs. $73 a year ago; the average US cable TV package costs $83 per month  —  Top studios turn screws on customers with price rises that rival expensive cable TV bundles  —  The era of cheap streaming is ending …

item.title: 情報筋デイリー・メール紙を所有するDMGTとその消費者部門であるDMG mediaの会長であるロザミア卿は、デイリー・テレグラフ紙の入札について投資家と協議中（Mark Kleinman/Sky News）。
item.description:
Mark Kleinman / Sky News:
Sources: Lord Rothermere, the chairman of Daily Mail-owner DMGT and its consumer unit DMG media, is in talks with investors about a bid for The Daily Telegraph  —  Lord Rothermere is courting potential backers to help him realise a longstanding ambition of uniting the Daily Mail and Daily Telegraph under his ownership, Sky News learns.

item.title: 新聞印刷所の閉鎖がもたらす影響について、距離による配達の問題、ローカルニュースへのアクセスの喪失、締め切りの早さ、コストの上昇などを見てみよう（Mark Caro/Local News Initiative）
item.description:
Mark Caro / Local News Initiative:
A look at the impact of newspaper printing press closures, like delivery issues due to distance, losing access to local news, early deadlines, and higher costs  —  Plant closures and consolidation prompt earlier deadlines, longer drives, higher costs as papers scramble to stay in print

item.title: 2021年4月のマーシャル火災の後に生まれたコロラド州のポップアップ・コミュニティ・ニュースルームの様子。ハワイ、マサチューセッツ、カナダの取り組みに似ている（Stacy Feldman/RJI）
item.description:
Stacy Feldman / RJI:
A look at the Colorado pop-up community newsroom that emerged after the Marshall Fire in April 2021, resembling efforts in Hawaii, Massachusetts, and Canada  —  We're building a guide to help newsrooms fill voids in deep-dive reporting with their communities

item.title: UMG、ソニー・ミュージックなどのレーベルがインターネット・アーカイブを著作権侵害で提訴、グレート78プロジェクトが楽曲の「違法レコード店」として機能していると指摘（Blake Brittain/Reuters）
item.description:
Blake Brittain / Reuters:
UMG, Sony Music, and other labels sue the Internet Archive for copyright infringement, saying its Great 78 Project works as an “illegal record store” for songs  —  Universal Music Group (UMG.AS), Sony Music Entertainment (6758.T) and other record labels on Friday sued …

item.title: アドビ、グーグル、マイクロソフト、アマゾン、ソニーを含むハリウッド・プロフェッショナル・アソシエーションは、AMPTP、WGA、SAG-AFTRAに解決策を見出すよう要請（Lucas Manfredi/The Wrap）
item.description:
Lucas Manfredi / The Wrap:
The Hollywood Professional Association, which includes Adobe, Google, Microsoft, Amazon, and Sony, urges the AMPTP, the WGA, and SAG-AFTRA to find a resolution  —  “Organizations indispensable to the creation of media are cutting staff... and in some cases, even risk closing,” the Hollywood Professional Association writes

item.title: イリノイ州、16歳未満のインフルエンサーとインフルエンサーに紹介された子供に収益の一定割合を与える、子どもインフルエンサーを保護する米国初の法律を可決（Fortesa Latifi/Teen Vogue）
item.description:
Fortesa Latifi / Teen Vogue:
Illinois passes the US' first law protecting child influencers, entitling influencers under age 16 and kids featured by influencers to a percentage of earnings  —  Illinois has officially passed the nation's first legislation aimed at protecting child influencers, in a move advocates …

item.title: マリオン郡レコード紙がレストラン・オーナーに関する記事を掲載した後、警察は地元判事の許可を得て同紙のオフィスと発行人の自宅を家宅捜索した（Sherman Smith/Kansas Reflector）。
item.description:
Sherman Smith / Kansas Reflector:
Police raided the Marion County Record's office, authorized by a local judge, and the publisher's home, after the newspaper ran stories about a restaurant owner  —  Eric Meyer, publisher of the Marion County Record, answers questions in his newspaper office Friday after police seized computers, servers, cellphones and other items.

item.title: WGAとAMPTPの代表が8月11日に会談、情報源：会談は8月4日の会談よりも生産的で、両者は8月15日に再度会談する予定（Wendy Lee/Los Angeles Times）
item.description:
Wendy Lee / Los Angeles Times:
WGA and AMPTP representatives met on August 11; source: the talks were more productive than the August 4 meeting, and the sides plan to meet again on August 15  —  Negotiators for film and TV writers met with studio representatives on Friday afternoon, a step that could represent a long-awaited thaw …

item.title: NBCユニバーサルが、バーやレストランなどの商業施設にピーコックの独占ライブ・スポーツ・コンテンツを配信する複数年契約を結ぶ（Anthony Crupi/Sportico）
item.description:
Anthony Crupi / Sportico:
NBCUniversal signs a multiyear deal to let EverPass distribute Peacock's exclusive live sports content to bars, restaurants, and other commercial establishments  —  The financial terms underpinning the multiyear pact were not disclosed.  —  The partnership will serve to expose Peacock's …

item.title: ロン・デサンティス陣営は8月11日、クーリエ・ニュースルームのアイオワ・スターティング・ラインの記者2人をアイオワの選挙イベントから締め出した。
item.description:
Ty Rushing / Iowa Starting Line:
Ron DeSantis' team barred two reporters of Courier Newsroom's Iowa Starting Line from an Iowa campaign event on August 11; no other media outlets were excluded  —  Gov. Ron DeSantis' campaign team today contacted law enforcement in an attempt to prohibit Iowa Starting Line reporters from covering …

item.title: フォックス社の最高法務・政策責任者であるベト・ディン氏は、7億8750万ドルのドミニオン社との和解後、2023年12月31日に退任し、フォックス社の顧問になる予定だ（Anthony Lin/Bloomberg）
item.description:
Anthony Lin / Bloomberg:
Fox Corp's chief legal and policy officer, Viet Dinh, plans to step down on December 31, 2023, and become a Fox adviser, after the $787.5M Dominion settlement  —  - Viet Dinh is departing as Fox chief legal and policy officer  — Fox paid $787.5 million to settle suit over vote-fraud claims

item.title: アラメダ元CEOキャロライン・エリソンの日記をNYTに公開するなど、証人への改ざんを司法省に告発されたSBFの保釈を取り消す米判事（Luc Cohen/Reuters）
item.description:
Luc Cohen / Reuters:
A US judge revokes SBF's bail after the DOJ accused him of tampering with witnesses, such as by sharing former Alameda CEO Caroline Ellison's diary with the NYT  —  Sam Bankman-Fried's bail was revoked ahead of his October fraud trial, a U.S. judge said on Friday, after prosecutors accused …
